claimReview.title: No evidence for a significant influence of volcanoes or solar variability on recent climate change contrary to Judith Curry’s claims in PragerU video

claims.text: Anti-abortion activist sentenced to 57 months in prison for “handing roses and resources to women at an abortion facility.”

claimReview.title: Activist sentenced for blocking access to D.C. abortion clinic, not for handing out roses

claims.text: For health risk exceptions in Florida’s abortion amendment, “You're not even talking to a doctor to make that determination.”

claims.text: Former President Donald Trump told Time magazine that “states should monitor women’s pregnancies and prosecute those who violate abortion bans.”

claimReview.title: Trump told Time that states should decide abortion laws. He didn't say they 'should' punish women.

claims.text: In his Time magazine interview, Donald Trump “said states have the right to monitor pregnant women to enforce these bans, and states have the right to punish pregnant women for seeking out abortion care.”
